subject:
svn commit: samba r22932 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/utils
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/utils
body:
Author: obnox
Date: 2007-05-16 11:57:37 +0000 (Wed, 16 May 2007)
New Revision: 22932

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=22932

Log:
Use the same symbol in sizeof and cast for talloc.


Modified:
   branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c
   branches/SAMBA_3_0_26/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c


Changeset:
Modified: branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c
===================================================================
--- branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c	2007-05-16 11:15:16 UTC (rev 22931)
+++ branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c	2007-05-16 11:57:37 UTC (rev 22932)
@@ -2170,7 +2170,7 @@
 		if (ctr_enum.printers_2[i].devmode != NULL) {
 
 			/* copy devmode (info level 2) */
-			ctr_dst.printers_2->devmode = (struct devicemode *)
+			ctr_dst.printers_2->devmode = (DEVICEMODE *)
 				TALLOC_MEMDUP(mem_ctx,
 					      ctr_enum.printers_2[i].devmode,
 					      sizeof(DEVICEMODE));

Modified: branches/SAMBA_3_0_26/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c
===================================================================
--- branches/SAMBA_3_0_26/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c	2007-05-16 11:15:16 UTC (rev 22931)
+++ branches/SAMBA_3_0_26/source/utils/net_rpc_printer.c	2007-05-16 11:57:37 UTC (rev 22932)
@@ -2166,7 +2166,7 @@
 		if (ctr_enum.printers_2[i].devmode != NULL) {
 
 			/* copy devmode (info level 2) */
-			ctr_dst.printers_2->devmode = (struct devicemode *)
+			ctr_dst.printers_2->devmode = (DEVICEMODE *)
 				TALLOC_MEMDUP(mem_ctx,
 					      ctr_enum.printers_2[i].devmode,
 					      sizeof(DEVICEMODE));
